page.title: 10Potato Picking.
page.content: My father works on a farm and early summer is the busiest time of year, because the potatos have to be picked. When the potato season starts it is allgo, potato-pickers come to help and my mum has to help too.Most nights after school my mum goes back to help and my sister and I are left at home until nine o'clock.On the weekend my sister and I go over and help also.My sister picks potatoes and I help to weigh the bags and drive the tractor. It is very difficult to sell the potatoes at the beging of the season because the prices are so low. Hopefully as the potato season goes on,the prices will go up ,but it is hard to tell when this will happen.The prices are Â£60 to Â£65 per tonne but as the season goes on they will go down to about Â£10 to Â£20 per tonne.
